name: Suman Rajak
summary: Full Stack & AI Engineer with 4+ years of experience delivering scalable web applications and cutting-edge Generative AI solutions. Proven leader in full-stack development (FastAPI, Python, React) within robust cloud environments (AWS) and scalable database solutions. Expertise spans advanced Generative AI capabilities, including RAG, LLM integration, vector databases, and embedding-based search. Track record of leading modules, providing technical solutions, and building production-grade, end-to-end AI-powered features with optimized backend performance.

cloud_devops: AWS (EC2, Lambda, S3, AppSync, Bedrock, OpenSearch)

details: Led backend development for a high-throughput transaction service, designing Nest.js APIs and MSSQL schemas, optimizing logic and testing, while also contributing to frontend development.
Architected and contributed to a Generative AI platform for a major pharmaceutical client, focusing on full-stack development, AI integration, and scalable cloud infrastructure.

Project Bristol Myers Squibb (BMS) â€“ GenAI-Based Content Tagging System (Feb 2025 - Present): Led the end-to-end development of a high-performance GenAI content extraction and tagging system, overseeing a team and providing technical leadership.
Applied advanced GenAI capabilities including LLM-based tag generation (AWS Bedrock) leveraging OpenSearch for efficient embedding storage and similarity search, increasing accuracy by 70%.
Developed robust full-stack components including FastAPI backend and responsive React frontend within a scalable AWS serverless ecosystem.

Project Bank of China Aviation - CRMS (Aug 2024 - Feb 2025): Designed and developed a high-throughput transaction service backend with Nest.js and MSSQL, implemented testing and optimized database queries, reducing latency by 30%.
Architected and developed enterprise web applications using Node.js, React, GraphQL, cloud services; delivered scalable RESTful APIs and optimized database queries.
Collaborated cross-functionally to implement features and contributed to AI and AR projects integrating deep learning and computer vision.

Project Daikin - Showroom AR App (Nov 2022 - Aug 2024): Led full-stack development for an immersive AR product configurator with Electron.js, React Native, and Node.js, applying deep learning for enhanced user experience.
Managed complex AR and IoT modules for seamless frontend-backend integration and high performance.
Developed React and Node.js applications; deployed stable releases on schedule.
Executed backend services and contributed to API design and database integration.
Built reusable React components and unit tests with React Testing Library.
Contributed to major client projects (Mamaearth, Lotus) ensuring UI consistency.
